name: Maketriage
tagline: Script used to automate the creation of OS X Triage drives and Apple ASD drives
body:
# maketriage Script used to automate the creation of OS X Triage drives and Apple ASD drives. ## Installation This script should be run from the same directory as the IMAGES and ASD folder, which contains all the .dmg files for restoring triage and ASD partitions. root folder
| |-- IMAGES
| +-- ASD
+-- triage.sh
## Basic Usage ## Configuration ## Documentation ## Contributing ## License
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
